title: 火速更新，optifine最新版————Preview OptiFine G6 for Minecraft 1.8.8。
author: satale
txt_content:
Preview OptiFine G6 for Minecraft 1.8.8 (added support for Custom Item Textures, updated Connected Textures to parse block variants, added custom colors: spawn eggs, dog collars, sheep, potion, map, text, xporb, added support for grid palettes, fixed shader shadows, compatible with Forge #1591)
不带的翻译了，大家将就的看下。
下载地址链接：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1gdyhJKv 密码：xuvh
